gist.headline: Polishing the welcome mat
gist.blurb: We've tidied up the documentation and unified the READMEs to make life easier for our Google Summer of Code contributors.
gist.summary: Updated root and GSOC-specific documentation, removed outdated policies, and reverted a model configuration in the GSOC bot.
gist.impact: New contributors will find clearer instructions and a more unified starting point in the repository.
gist.visual_concept: The Pollinations bee acting as a friendly guide or librarian, helping new developers navigate. Represents documentation updates and welcoming new contributors.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the chubby 8-bit bee mascot holding a large open book, guiding tiny pixelated developer characters. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, library or garden path setting. Lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Text in pixel font: 'DOCS'. Nostalgic, welcoming, and organized.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the pollinations.ai bee setting up a wooden welcome sign and organizing pixelated guidebooks. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text 'GSoC'. Nostalgic but beautiful, emotionally warm.
